cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky, but I'm not a star. I travel around a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I am a crescent, sometimes I am full.
🧀 People used to think I was made of cheese!
🌎 I go around the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am very hot and give light to Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am a giant ball of burning gas.
😎 You shouldn't look directly at me!
🌼 Plants need me to grow.

cosmos.question: I am the planet you live on. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water.
🏡 I am your home.
🌱 Plants and animals live here.

cosmos.question: I'm a big, round ball of gas and liquid that travels around the sun. I'm not Earth, and I'm known for my big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I'm the biggest planet in our solar system.
💨 I'm made mostly of gas.
🔴 My spot is a giant storm!

cosmos.question: I am a cold and red planet. People sometimes call me the 'Red Planet'. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People have sent rovers to explore me.
🍫 I am the color of rust.
👽 Some people think aliens live here.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me, made mostly of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very wide but very thin.
🌬️ I am a gas giant.
🪐 I am the sixth planet from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a pattern in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ Some are named after animals, like Ursa Major.
🌌 People used to use them to navigate.
🔭 You can see me at night.

cosmos.question: I am a small planet, that is the closest to the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I am extremely hot during the day and extremely cold at night.
🏃 I am the fastest planet to orbit the sun.
🌑 I have no moons.

cosmos.question: I am a big group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our Sun is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.
🥛 Our one is called the Milky Way.
✨ I contain billions of stars.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust that leaves a bright tail when I fly near the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am like a dirty snowball.
💨 My tail always points away from the sun.
🌠 Some take thousands of years to orbit the sun once.

transport.question: I have wheels and can take you to the park. You can pedal me with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You might ride me with a helmet.
🛣️ I'm often ridden on a path or street.
💪 You need to use your legs to make me move.

transport.question: I am big and yellow, and I take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🏫 I stop at special places to pick up kids.
🛑 I have flashing lights to keep children safe.
🎶 You might sing songs on me.

transport.question: I go on the water and can carry many people and cars. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm much bigger than a rowboat.
🗺️ I can take you to an island.
⚓ I often have a horn that makes a loud sound.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and can take you very far, very fast. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I need a runway to take off and land.
💺 You sit in a seat with a seatbelt.
✈️ I have wings and engines.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and can carry many people between cities. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a specific path made of metal.
🎫 You need a ticket to ride me.
📣 I often make a 'choo-choo' sound.

transport.question: I have a siren and flashing lights, and I help people who are hurt. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I have a bed inside for patients.
🏥 I take people to the hospital.
🚨 I make a loud noise to warn other cars.

transport.question: I have a long ladder and spray water to put out fires. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I help people when there is a fire.
🚒 I am usually red.
💧 I use a hose to spray water.

transport.question: I fly high above the clouds, but I don't have wings like an airplane. I use spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place.
📍I can land on a building or a small area.
👨‍✈️ I have a pilot, but not a flight attendant

transport.question: I am a vehicle that can go almost anywhere, even over rough and bumpy terrain. I'm often used on farms. What am I?

hints.text: 🚜 I can pull heavy loads.
🌾 I help farmers plant and harvest crops.
🚧 I am very strong and sturdy.

transport.question: I travel to space, far beyond the Earth! I need a powerful engine to escape gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I can carry astronauts to the moon.
🪐 I explore other planets.
🌌 I leave Earth with a fiery blast.
